00018                 public function DiarioCommentFollowupEmail($params)
00019                 {

00021                                 $params['comment'] instanceof DiarioComment)
00022                         {
00023                                 $this->comment = $params['comment'];
00024                         }

00026                         {                               
00027                                 $this->comment = new DiarioComment();
00028                                 $this->comment->find_by_id($params['comment_id']);
00029                         }

00031                         
00032                         $this->name = $params['name'];
00033                         $this->email = $params['email'];
00034                         $this->subject = !empty($params['subject']) ?
00035                                 $params['subject'] :
00036                                 sprintf(self::default_subject, $this->comment->diario_post->title);

00041 Comment:
00042 {$this->comment->text}
00043 EOT;
00044                         $this->date = date("d/m/Y H:i:s");

00052                 {
